about_the_game:
Pregnancy

Pregnancy is the most incredible time of every woman’s life. You can feel the new life growing inside you, but as your belly gets bigger you start to feel its weight and all the inconveniences coming with it.
- keep your "marriage calendar"
- do a pregnancy test
- reign over your appetite
- consult yourself about nausea and vomiting



Labor is one of the most spectacular miracles in the world and the pain coming with it is unimaginable. Try to experience it in this simulation.
- experience the birth


Feeding may be quite a challenge. You will try to feed your baby with breasts, bottles, and spoons. Every meal is another adventure.
- prepare meals
- take care of your child's diet


When your baby poops or vomits you will have to clean it up and take care of its hygiene.
- take care of the hygiene and cleanliness of your child


Maternity is really hard work. You have no idea how much effort is required to keep the house clean.
- take care of cleanliness at home
- clean, renovate, modify space depending on the current needs


The safety of your baby is the most important thing. See for yourself how difficult it is to control your baby and protect it from the danger of the outer world.
- secure space in the House
- follow your child and react in situations of dangerous

Crawling, learning to walk, and getting to know the environment with all the senses are the milestones of your child’s growth. Let him learn about the world safely and assist him when necessary.

Health

Take care of your baby’s health and give him proper medicine if he needs one.
- diagnosed your child
- give him help - give medicine, if necessary


Your home will become a playground. Children have the craziest and most creative ideas. What if your partner acts like a child too?
- your husband also requires comments and care

short_description: Become a mother and experience the best of maternity. The game is for future mothers, so they know what to expect, and also for their partners, so they can experience things their women do. The adventure begins just as you see the pregnancy test is positive.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
